text: “Ndipo ngati nkovuta kwa iwe kudzipatula kwawoku (ndi zomwe wadza nazozi pomwe iwo akukuumiriza kuti uwabweretsere chozizwitsa, nawe nkumafuna; zikadatero, pomwe Ine sindikufuna), choncho ngati uli wokhoza kufunafuna njira ya pansi penipeni m’nthaka (kukafuna zozizwitsazo), kapena (ungathe kupeza) makwelero nkukwera kumwamba nkubwera ndi chozizwitsa (chimene akufuna, chita). Allah Akadafuna akadawasonkhanitsa onse ku chiwongoko. Choncho, usakhale mwa osazindikira zinthu
